Detailed Description

Contains information of the customer preferences and about the vehicle used by the customer.

Currently, one of cost A -- D is one and the others hold the value zero. The one carrying cost one indicates what kind of routing will take place (A - distance cost routing, B - time routing, C - time routing with traffic disturbances and D is currently not used). Vehicleparam tells what kind of vehicle to calculate the route for.

bool RMDriverPref::m_isStartTime [private]
 

Tells if startOrEndTime is used as startTime or EndTime (if that variable) is used.

True means startTime, false means endTime.

uint32 RMDriverPref::m_time [private]
 

The time associated with the routing (start time or end time for the route.

Whether it is starttime or not is determined by the bool isStartTime. This member does not always have a meaning.

int32 RMDriverPref::m_vehicleParam [private]
 

This variable is a bitfield containing information on the type of vehicle used by the customer.

It is to be ANDed with the connection information.

ItemTypes.
